name: Dark Throne
description: Dark Throne is a 2D sidescrolling RPG game with a simple pixel art graphics, set in a dark fantasy world. Playing the knight you will have to free the land from the curse and sit on the throne of the kingdom.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows vista Processor: dual-core processor with four threads Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: AMD radeon 7750 Storage: 250 MB available space Additional Notes: Mobile and integrated graphics cards may not be supported,  xbox 360 controller
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: quad-core processor with eight threads Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: AMD radeon 7770 Storage: 250 MB available space Additional Notes: Mobile and integrated graphics cards may not be supported, xbox 360 controller
